title: Park Il-kap
text: Park Il-kap (<a href="Hangul">Hangul</a>: 박일갑, <a href="Hanja">Hanja</a>: 朴日甲; 1 November 1923 – 11 September 1987) is a South Korean <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> who played for the <a href="South%20Korea%20national%20football%20team">South Korea</a> in the <a href="1954%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1954 FIFA World Cup</a>. He also played for <a href="Seoul%20Football%20Club%20%28ROK%20Army%20CIC%29">Seoul Football Club</a>.
